title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for sets up ratio

1 point is earned for computes limit of ratio

1 point is earned for identifies interior of interval of convergence

1 point is earned for considers both endpoints

1 point is earned for analysis and interval of convergence

| x 2n+3 2n+5 ⋅ 2n+3 x 2n+1 |=( 2n+3 2n+5 )⋅ x 2 lim n→∞ ( 2n+3 2n+5 )⋅ x 2 = x 2 x 2 <1⇒−1<x<1

When x = −1, the series is − 1 3 + 1 5 − 1 7 + 1 9 −⋅⋅⋅ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaeyOeI0YaaS aaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaG4maaaacqGHRaWkdaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaa caaI1aaaaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaiEdaaaGaey4kaS YaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGyoaaaacqGHsislcqGHflY1cqGHflY1 cqGHflY1aaa@478B@

This series converges by the Alternating Series Test.

When x = 1, the series is 1 3 − 1 5 + 1 7 − 1 9 +⋅⋅⋅ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaGaaG4maaaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaI1aaa aiabgUcaRmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaiEdaaaGaeyOeI0YaaSaaae aacaaIXaaabaGaaGyoaaaacqGHRaWkcqGHflY1cqGHflY1cqGHflY1 aaa@469E@

This series converges by the Alternating Series Test.

Therefore, the interval of convergence is −1≤x≤1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaeyOeI0IaaG ymaiabgsMiJkaadIhacqGHKjYOcaaIXaaaaa@3CC0@ .
